definition: A term commonly employed to refer to the stage of life when an individual has reached a certain number of years since birth, typically associated with maturity and experience. It is often used to describe someone's age or to indicate a specific period in a person's life.

examples.german: Er ist im Alter von 40 gestorben.
examples.english: He died at the age of 40.

examples.german: Sie sieht viel j√ºnger aus als ihr wahres Alter.
examples.english: She looks much younger than her actual age.

examples.german: Im Alter von 18 Jahren darf man in Deutschland Auto fahren.
examples.english: At the age of 18, you are allowed to drive a car in Germany.
